PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-08042020-10-09,  ,  ,  ,  ESDC
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Labour Standards Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the CANADA LABOUR STANDARDS REGULATIONS in order to temporarily suspend an employer’s ability to require an employee to provide a certificate from a health care practitioner if he or she is absent for three or more days on medical leave.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Canada Labour Standards Regulations
precis: Regulations amending the CANADA LABOUR STANDARDS REGULATIONS in order to temporarily suspend an employer’s ability to require an employee to provide a certificate from a health care practitioner if he or she is absent for three or more days on medical leave.
